name: The Game of The Playful
description:

Also the sprites (expressions) drawings can be found at
https去掉://tieb去掉a.去掉baidu.去掉com去掉/p/去掉6104515346?red_tag=0125942175
（please delete the Chinese characters 去掉 before directing to the link）

The Game of The Playful is a visual novel created by one person (characters are drew by outsourced artists). The engine this game used is Visual Novel Maker.
In this visual novel, you'll play as the Heroine and experience eight individual stories. In each story, you will establish either friendship or romantic relationships with a man. All eight stories are independent from each other, so you'll be dating with only one person in one story.

Key Features
1. Select one of eight guys as your love interest. Each story has multiple branching paths. The choices you make in the game will lead you to different endings. There are 20+ endings in total for the eight stories.
2. Keep track of your romance parameters with each man because it can also affect your ending.
3. You can customize the names for the Heroine as well as all the eight men.
